website_summaries.verdict: A four-pole canvas tent that also works as a decoration.
pros: Unlike most kids' play tents, this is one you might want to leave up
The canvas is of high quality, and at 59 inches this tent is reasonably tall
cons: Assembly can be difficult, and it may fall over when kids are playing in it

website_summaries.verdict: A good value on this tent, which is the right size for small children or apartment living.
pros: More compact and less expensive than some other teepees
cons: The base can tend to slide around on some floors

customer_reviews.title: Great user friendly teepee
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough about this teepee. It’s super well made and assembled so easily (10 minutes with me and my 5 year old). It came with floor fabric, decorations, light up stars, and a carrying case. The inside has a window and even two large pockets to hold treasures. My kids love it and I love how easy it is to set up a s take down. I would recommend it for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Long

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Cute attachments and features.
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this teepee! It is super easy to use and it’s great quality and I love all of the features like the window and the pockets on the inside. I also love that it breaks down easy and can fit onto one little carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Jordan (@outpostofheaven)

customer_reviews.title: Fun teepee for children!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for my 4 year old niece who's big into her imagination phase right now. It was easy to set up, taking <10 minutes. I chose not to get a mat or pad for under it because I figured she could decorate it however she wanted. It has entry flaps that Velcro close and a window on the side to look out. Pockets on the inside that can hold books easily. The product is good quality for the price. I believe it's totally worth it and you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Teepee tent for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Perfect teepee tent for toddlers! It's very easy to set up, and the size is just about right. My two-year-old spent hours in it. The cute little window is perfect for peekaboo, and the pockets inside the tent hold a lot of her small toys. I had worried the tent collapsed easily, as it is a con indicated by some reviews. Fortunately we have not came across this issue in the first week. With an insert at the top the tent is sturdy. Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: J Helen

customer_reviews.title: Great product, fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Great product, fast shipping, and exactly what I was looking for. My 20 month old's new favorite place. Loved the strong canvas material and pockets on the inside and outside.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Mockett

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Pinterest perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This teepee is AMAZING! My toddlers love playing in it and I love that it's easily washable and it comes with a handy dandy carrying case, which I just hang on the back so we don't misplace it. We weren't super sure what the right way is to tie the tops together so we just did the best we could. I'm sure it could be better but it serves its purpose, so no complaints. It has a pocket on the inside and outside. Attached are pictures of it and a pic of the case just hanging out on the back.
customer_reviews.author: Emerald S.

customer_reviews.title: Great teepee for kids and a fantastic price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Got it for my two year old's birthday and she loves having her own space. My 5 year old loves it just as much. Very easy to put together... maybe 10 minutes and sets up very easily. The only confusing part of the directions is that it does not tell you to loop the string through the pole holes AND the fabric loops at the top. Didn't take long to figure that out, though. Love it and would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Set up and Light Weight
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my two dogs to have a den to play in. Not only is it beautiful, it is very easy to set up (5 min), and take down (2 seconds). It is also very light weight (lighter than you think), so it is easy to move from room to room if you need the space for something else. Example: We have it set up in our living room (since that is where the dogs spend most of their time.), but I have taken it upstairs for "bedtime" and it is lighter than holding a large blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and perfectly made.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the $$! Comes in a nice tough canvas with wooden poles and a cute flag banner and rope to tie poles together. If you don't know how to put up a tipi, you will struggle. Make sure tops of poles are criss-crossed together and then weave the rope around each pole and then across and around the entire top. Then push your pole bottoms outward and pull canvas down. May take some adjusting but it isn't difficult. Great and sturdy product.
customer_reviews.author: Jose C.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and adorable
customer_reviews.text: This teepee is a heavy duty canvas with really thick dowels. I was very impressed with the quality. The little window with 2 pockets is great. The Velcro tie backs are great. I really love the multi-colored pennant banner that came with it. If you're looking for a teepee, BUY THIS ONE. it's the best quality at the best price you will find.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Turner

customer_reviews.title: GET THIS ONE!
customer_reviews.text: I love how this tent comes with the “anti-collapsible” device to ensure that it doesn’t fall/collapse on children while playing with/in it! The New Zealand pine poles are smooth (no rough edges of splinters) the quality is amazing! Quality fabric, love the window detail! I had been searching a long time and I am so glad this is the one in my home! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Play TeePee
customer_reviews.text: We received this chic little white teepee for our daughter’s. It was the perfect size for them to just play, relax and make memories in. It was so easy to put together and watching the instruction video helped make it such a smooth set up. The white Teepee comes with a bag for storage or bringing places, it has the cutest little window that my girls love, it has an awesome pouch on the inside that my girls put books in right away and it’s very sturdy. My girls love it and I love how clean and sleek it is. It fits perfectly in our home.
customer_reviews.author: Jnel09

customer_reviews.title: This was the perfect addition to my son's room
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect addition to my son's room. We did a complete makeover creating a bohemian, outdoorsy vibe as we said 'adieu' to his baby crib (which he NEVER slept in)! We added a felt campfire and faux lambskin rug to it and now he's 'camping out' indoors almost every night, It was extremely easy to assemble, didn't look cheap and held up just fine as far as the legs go. It is a bit more natural in color and not stark white as the photo would suggest.
customer_reviews.author: Femme Fatale

customer_reviews.title: Ok not great. Look for better
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok for price. What i don’t like. - to close the tent doors you have to bring poles in making it very small and narrow like in pic. So doesn’t look as good. - Mat is not a mat. It’s just a sheet that you tie to bottom of pole and it does not fit the same shape as the tent bottoms when fully open. It’s strange. - horrible smell straight out of box but went away with one wash. -flag was frayed at seems However son loves it and doesn’t care about any of that. So will keep for price.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Sheffield

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Love it, but slight struggle with setup.
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to assemble but tying the top together was confusing in the instructions so I tried watching the YouTube video and we were both still confused. We finally gave up when we think we got the anti collapse piece in. It doesn’t look pretty at the top but I doubt anyone will notice. That is really the only reason for a star off. Otherwise this is fantastic!!! And my girls love it! I love the little accessories that came with it too, nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Want to spend two hours (while your child screams) as you try to figure this monster out? Then this product it for you! The instructions are terrible. Comes with holes at the top of the poles....but you aren’t supposed to use them. Tip: all the poles should fold in a clockwise direction. Not mentioned in instructions. Every time I went to stand the tent up the opening flap would rip farther and farther so now they are safety pinned together because the front legs open too far otherwise. There is a link to a YouTube video in the packaging....and I’m pretty sure the woman is telling you what to do in Chinese! Instructions in English, video in Chinese.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Drylewski

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Tipi
customer_reviews.text: The tipi is beautiful! It arrived on time and my son loves it, it has become his little nook. I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up
customer_reviews.text: This is nice quality material. This was not hard to put together, thankfully, as the instructions were a little confusing. Also, I thought the velcro to keep the curtains open were in an odd place and feel like it should have been placed differently - but this is not a huge deal! There is one piece that this came with that has a big bolt and two wooden ends.. not sure where this goes?? I couldn't find it anywhere on the instructions. But seems to be a great product so far! I am excited to decorate it a little more for my little ones 1st birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Caity

customer_reviews.title: Cute but doesn't assemble well
customer_reviews.text: It's certainly cute once set up but we had to use epoxy to get some of the wooden dowels to stay in the plastic connectors. Otherwise the ends that go into the connectors were too small and didn't stay. Almost like they were shaved down too small and the connectors were 2 sizes too big on 3 of them. We made it work because I bought it to use for my photo sessions. It definitely works for that purpose but I wasn't thrilled with having to make my own "repairs" to get it to stay together and that I'll never be able to take it apart if I needed to.
customer_reviews.author: Poehler

customer_reviews.title: The perfect tent!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is so adorable and so well made! My daughter is already in love with it and I can't get her to leave it most days. I love the little window and pockets on the inside so she can store books or art supplies. My only complaint is that when putting it together to poles connect so perfectly that if you make a mistake it's really hard to pull them apart. But that just means it's super sturdy! I would recommend this tent to any of my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Ohkayelove

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Teepee with all the details
customer_reviews.text: I bought this precious teepee last week and my boys are in love. They sit in it to read all the time. It came in a small package and was easily assembled. The package included the tent, lights, bunting, and paper feathers for adorable style. I’m so glad it can be taken apart and stored in an 18 inch bag. We have a smaller house, so this is perfect for having out or storing away.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Star lights didn’t work but it’s still super cute
customer_reviews.text: I used brand new batteries, looked if something short circuited but nothing worked and it still doesn’t work. That honestly didn’t bother me, just as long as the actual product worked and all items were in the box, which they all were. The instructions were simple and easy to put together, it also comes with extra reenforcement for the top of the teepee. It’s not extravagant but it holds up really good and we decorated it ourselves. We also had lights so that worked out.
customer_reviews.author: Dawna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect TEEPEE
customer_reviews.text: OH, I can wash it when my daughters little hands covered in food leave little hand prints. She loves playing in it all day. I decorated with some lights, put a blanket under and a whole bunch of pillows inside. The window is a cute detail. Very VERY easy to assemble. It isn't terribly sturdy but holds up to an one year old playing and two dogs going in and out as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: This is really cute, but it doesn’t stay up very well, and if your kids are kinda rough like mine, I have to constantly fix it and readjust it which is annoying. It’s been sitting in the corner folded up for a little bit now because I’ve gotten tired of fixing it. The cloth constantly falls off the poles & the sticks don’t stay in place. Would be cute for a photo shoot, but not very practical.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived defective. One of the top poles was missing a hole and the star lights came broken. The canvas seems sturdy. I wouldn't recommend this product but that's just my opinion. I am probably going to try another company, like crate and barrel or pottery barn kids for a toddler teepee. At least I know their products will be inspected before delivery.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rocha

customer_reviews.title: Great for playroom or photos. We love it!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this tepee! It was an easy set up and my daughter fell in love with it when she saw it. There’s a little window she loves peeking out from, 2 pockets for books that she kept putting books and blocks in and flaps you can roll back and fasten towards the sides. Super cute for photos or backdrops for parties! Makes an excellent gift as well. The quality of the fabric is great, and I just love the color of the natural wood.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Well made, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about it. Looks very cool...awaiting grand kids to try it out. Wish the poles were already in it. Video showed someone demonstrating and I think she said to start inserting the poles at the bottom but that was hard to do so I quit and started at the top...MUCH easier. Fast delivery, good price and well made.
customer_reviews.author: CLAY LADY

customer_reviews.title: Very cute tent but may not hold up against rough and tumble kiddos!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 4 year old daughter at Christmas. She has really been enjoying it and it’s very cute in our space! I wish it was a little sturdier. It seems to get saggy and recently the anti-collapse thing fell out and we haven’t been able to get it to stay back once. I wish the poles didn’t pop apart so easily and actually screwed together. Fortunately, our daughter isn’t too rough with it so it has been fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but..
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to assembly on my own, once I called my mom to help it was easier. Instructions were a bit hard to understand because it was just pictures. The sticks that connect to each other do not hold on to one another well, they slip off and it is not sturdy for kids because it may fall on them. It is nice for pictures but not for kids to play, which is why I wanted this teepee. Wish it was more durable, I think I might try to glue the sticks together so they don't come apart when it stands.
customer_reviews.author: ViryVee

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT TEEPEE
customer_reviews.text: We love this teepee it is easy to assemble, it’s so sturdy! And it’s got this method so it doesn’t collapse while someone is inside! Also it is of great size! And great decor for a baby/toddlers room! And the quality is amazing! The lights don’t come with batteries but I don’t mind that at all, most items don’t come with batteries anyway! But super cute teepee! We totally recommend getting this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Tiare

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Product
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. Very high quality tent. I had a cheap plastic one prior and broke the teepee pole... these are actually wooden and will not break. The canvas for the teepee is also quality. It did take some strength assembling the poles together but overall about a 15min setup. Glad the flags are boyish colors - I was a little worried they would be girly as the marketing on the product is very targeted for girls but my son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn Brown

customer_reviews.title: Best deal
customer_reviews.text: Did lots of shopping around this was by far the best deal. Very nice quality fabric. Just the right size for toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Lillie K.

customer_reviews.title: Best Teepee!!
customer_reviews.text: My kids are in love with our new teepee from little dove store. The quality is amazing. The fabric is thick white canvas with perfect stitching and its machine washable. There is a 4 square window as well (which my kids adore). There are tie backs for the opening as well as velcro closures. There are two large pockets inside below the window. It also comes with a little banner and an anti-collapse kit, which is essential. Set up was amazingly simple and they even provide link to a helpful video that shows set up. The quality for the price just cant be beat for this one! The seller is also so kind and helpful!!
customer_reviews.author: Scbenson

customer_reviews.title: Best teepee around!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 9 month old for Christmas to keep toys in and have a cozy place to read books and hangout. It's the most sturdy teepee I've found and I've been looking for well over a month. The lights it comes with are very cute and pretty long. The only draw back is the "decorations" are 3 feathers? I don't see the point in including only 3 but not really an issue just was confused! If reccomend this teepee to anyone with a little one that wants something very sturdy. I like that it's washable too! Such a great purchase excited for baby to use!
customer_reviews.author: Biabell

customer_reviews.title: Must have for your littles!!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a beautiful tent. I love the window it has on the side. It comes with a banner and lights. All you need is 2 batteries for the lights. My kids have been loving it and I can’t wait to take pictures of my daughter in it when she turns one!
customer_reviews.author: Xochitl

customer_reviews.title: Really nice, nearly perfect. Would def. recommend
customer_reviews.text: Nice kids teepee. Only Problem I had was the legs keep wanting to creep in. You wouldn’t have this problem on carpet, however on floor I’m constantly adjusting. Adding something the grips to the bottom would be helpful. I can however do that myself easy enough. Overall it looks very nice and I am very happy with it overall. I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Simple design + folds away easily!
customer_reviews.text: I love that the teepee is neutral and blends in beautifully with the home. It came with a flag banner, gold sparkle feather banner, and string lights which we love using to add a sweet touch. Since the teepee is so neutral, it can easily be decorated for different holidays. The possibilities are endless! Set up was easy and it stores without hassle by simply folding it together. Such a great feature for a smaller room/home. Overall it’s a great purchase and fun for young children. My daughter is 1 and enjoys her teepee :)
customer_reviews.author: sarah cambio

customer_reviews.title: Very cute teepee
customer_reviews.text: This teepee is so darling for a bedroom or playroom! We used ours to take our 1 year olds photos outside. Perfect photo shoot prop! Very cute lights, banner & feather decoration details. My toddlers also enjoy reading books or playing pretend house in this teepee. This would be a great gift! As far as sturdy, I'd say it's somewhat sturdy. For my baby, yes. For my toddlers, it did come in on itself easily,but it never fell down on them. Set up was very simple to do!
customer_reviews.author: Outdoor E.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Toddlers
customer_reviews.text: This teepee is perfect in our daughter's room. I have two toddlers (ages 2 & 3) and we've put this in our five month old's room as a place for them to read while I get her down/nurse. I love to hear their imaginations run wild through their convo's as well as the "secrecy" they believe the teepee provides. It's also aesthetically pleasing in either their Woodland boys room or our daughter's BOHO girls room. <3 Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rugrats on Oils

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Quality and Design!
customer_reviews.text: I love this teepee and more importantly my son loves it, any time his friends come over they want to play in it. It’s very well made and easy to put together. It comes with the floor fabric, light up stars, and a carrying case. It's a great reading spot for my son and coordinates well with his room decor. Now that we have summer weather he has moved it outside and wants to have a camp out! I would recommend it for sure A++++++
customer_reviews.author: HomeonMountforest

customer_reviews.title: A teepee for an 18 month old
customer_reviews.text: This teepee is the perfect size for a young toddler. It is durable and large enough for the child to play and hide inside. My grandson loves playing hide and seek and this little tent is perfect for that game. Yet it doesn't take up much space so you don't have to give a whole room over to it. Price point excellent also.
customer_reviews.author: caitsmimi

customer_reviews.title: Adorable! Great for toddlers or older!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice size tent for a toddler. Me and my 2 year old can sit upright together inside comfortably to read a book. She loves having her own little space like this and I love the veratility to decorate it with seasons or holidays and special occasions. The material is a good quality and my husband assembled it in 10 mins. Would recommend to anyone looking for a little teepee for their kids.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: Great product but I had a few issues
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter room, and I will say first that she LOVED it. She was so happy to play and have fun in it. After about month, it seems to keep sliding inwards. My husband and I tried fixing it many times but nothing seemed to work. Then, the poles started coming apart inside. It started falling over and having a hard time staying up. We followed the Instructions to a T and even tried pulling it down and re-assembling it. Maybe it was just the one I purchased, not sure. So now unfortunately it's folded up. I will say that my daughter did love this. So I would recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Krein

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my two year old and she absolutely loves it. One day last week it started down pouring rain while we had it outside. My husband was super rough with the tent trying to close it to bring inside and snapped one of the poles. I messaged the company and they sent a new pole right away. Fantastic customer service and a amazing tent.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first because I wanted something both my almost 6 and 2 year old would both get use out of. I know these usually run small and not big enough for kids to play in. This is the PERFECT size. They can both fit comfortably in it while playing and it’s also not so bulky that it takes up the entire room. It was easy to put together and i didn’t really even need directions and the fabric that the tent is made of is very thick and good quality. Love that it comes with accessories to decorate it, although they’re on the girlier side they are still very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Makenzie

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best gift we have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 3 year old for her birthday. Her brother and her had to spend the night in it of course so I had to set it up. With help from the kids the assembly took maybe 20 minutes (those with kids know that means it could have been done in half that time, but the help is nice)! Be sure to use the brace made from the long screw, two wooden wheels, and the butterfly nut, as this really helps keep the poles from moving and keeps the teepee sturdy. The quality of this product and the ease of assembly made this one of the best gifts we have ever purchased for our children.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin N Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Cute but its always on the floor or taken apart
customer_reviews.text: My toddler moves in there and its already on the floor and taken apart. It not sturdy at all. they take the wooden sticks of the inside from its place constantly. I also had to remove the floor mat (that is actually just a fabric) because it would get stuck under their feet and make the whole thing fall down. I regret buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Naty

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not easy to stabilize
customer_reviews.text: My 3 and 1 yr olds seem to love having a teepee and I love the simple look, and that it’s quick to set up. I don’t love that the stabilizing screw is difficult to use and that the teepee falls over anyway. Also this doesn’t come with a base to anchor the four legs, also a factor in our frequent tip-overs. For those looking for a decorative teepee/infrequently used/by one calm child, this is great. For more than one rambunctious child I would advise a more stable model.
customer_reviews.author: NPSM

customer_reviews.title: Not Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Set this up for my kids but we have to constantly readjust the sticks because a slight movement while the kids a are inside the teepee will move the stick to a different position causing it the fold or become uneven.
customer_reviews.author: Khai Pham

customer_reviews.title: Came dirty with a grease stain.
customer_reviews.text: Love this tent. Adorable a Well made. It was easy to put together. The reason I’m giving it o Ly three stars in because it came with a huge black grease spot on it. Which is super disappointing. My kiddos are in love with it and I hate to take it away from them. So now I’m spend a bunch of time trying to get out a stain from what is supposed to be a “new” product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Our Twins LOVED it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandchildren who are four year old twins, (girl and boy). Both of them love it! It has enough space for the two of them to play in. We hung twinkling lights through the top and they use it as their favorite little hideaway. It does not have a bottom, so be sure to put it either on carpet or get a floor cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Goddess

customer_reviews.title: Won't hold up
customer_reviews.text: The poles are loose and I'm going to have to duck tape to strengthen. The tied attached to the top of the canvas will never last I can see that. I'd return but too much trouble. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen L.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Kids will love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the tent. Great quality. Kids love it so much I bought a second one for upstairs. Only complaint is that it was missing a pole to put it together but husband was able to make one. Amazon was quick to resolve the matter and send us a replacement but we decided to keep both tents.
customer_reviews.author: S. Goodin

customer_reviews.title: Adorable neutral tent with extras!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I got this tent for my 4 kids! It looks great in my girls and boys room and is roomy enough for two! I loved the extras it comes with like the star lights, banner, inside pockets and little window. The tent is durable and was easy to put together which was nice because sometimes kid toys are too hard to put together!
customer_reviews.author: aet

customer_reviews.title: Fun Toy, Well Made, Good Price
customer_reviews.text: One fun toy. I’m a big grampa and even I had a blast playing with the kids and this teepee. Can you imagine a grown dude and two four year olds cuddling inside this thing playing? Well we did it and it took all our playing and never broke. At least not yet after four weeks of hard use. What a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy Joe

customer_reviews.title: Not that great of quality
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy...I couldn't get it to stand up without folding in. Not that great of quality...I've had another that was much thicker canvas and was very sturdy so I was thinking this would be the same but it wasn't. It's cute if you just want it for something temporary like a photo shoot or something, but it never would have worked with my kids playing in it on a regular basis. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Chapman Fam

customer_reviews.title: Cute and roomy teepee!
customer_reviews.text: Our little ones love playing in their teepee! This completes our playroom. It was easy to set up - took me less than 10 mins. It also comes with a mechanism to secure the poles open, which there is a helpful YouTube video on how to do that. We have had fun playing in it. There is lots of room - room for more than one baby or small pup. It even came with a cute little flag banner too which was a fun surprise! Good purchase especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy the Pup

customer_reviews.title: good teepee
customer_reviews.text: Updating my original review. Originally I didn’t like this teepee - when I first assembled it the poles came apart. That being said it just took a day or two and the poles seemed to do better and it’s actually held up quite well. If you are looking for a good quality reasonably priced teepee this is a good option. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, but not stable
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute teepee and looks amazing in my girls room, but the instructions were not helpful and didn’t even list all the parts that came with the teepee, like my husband said, it looked like the instructions were printed for a different teepee. It’s not sturdy so I’m worried about my daughter playing around it. She can easily knock it over. We used it for her first birthday photos but I have not put it back up in her room. Wish it was more stable and safe!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is nice and thick, I had some issues at first, but the company reached out to me to offer step by step guidance.
customer_reviews.author: Tylesha Greene

customer_reviews.title: Playroom from cool auntie!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Easy to put it together. The stars twinkle lights isn’t bright but I have extras that would brighten up inside. Nice surprise that have garland, feathers twinkle lights, a bag to put it away, and tie floor mat. My nephews and nieces would love it when they come visit! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, little kid tent. Instructions are confusing. Very good!
customer_reviews.text: Its a good teepee. The post are sturdy and the canvas is good. It come with lights and flags and feathers. The lights are actually pretty bright. My only complaint is that the instructions are hard to follow. I had to watch a video of a similar product. But it's adjustable and sturdy. If you're looking for a little kids tent I would definitely suggest it.
customer_reviews.author: ScaredyHart

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: Super adorable I bought this for our nursery and for my older step daughter to use. I love it and for the price the quality is great. Recommend to have a partner to help set up as I did it alone but being very pregnant probably didn't help. Would definitely get this as a gift too. The little window in the side kills me 😍, it also has pockets inside and Velcro to close the flaps. Came with a little triangle grey and white banner that I didnt see till after I took the picture. We love it and can't wait to see our girls playing in it!
customer_reviews.author: cody blackmon

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy tee-pee with poor accessories
customer_reviews.text: It seems tee-pee seems fairly well-made. The lights look cheap and it came with an ugly circus-like banner that we didn't use. My 2-year old like hanging out in there and looking out the window. It's not big enough for an adult but 2 small kids could fit in there.
customer_reviews.author: CL0906

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up! Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy this was to set up. Each of the four poles has a top piece, a bottom piece, two middle pieces and plastic pieces that connect them all. I especially appreciated the top rope has shoelace type ends to make them easy to thread through the top holes. Overall very easy set up and the canvas is the perfect shade of off white
customer_reviews.author: Shaina Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this teepee! It would be great for boys or girls. There’s lots of room height and width wise, yet not too big in the room. It is very well constructed and the canvas is a nice thick material. It would be sweet for a sleepover, party, picture prop or just for play. It is super easy to put together and move from room to room. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Blogginmom

customer_reviews.title: No lights
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice and good quality, although it did not come with a mat, feather or lights.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable little nook!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tee pee for my nephew for Christmas I filled it with cute stuffed animals and books and a blanket and pillow and night light to make it a cozy little nook for him and he absolutely loved it. It was exactly what I wanted. He sat in it to open his gifts and couldn’t wait to take it home. Easy to assemble I did it by myself and great quality for the price considering how expensive these tee pee tents are at some other retailers. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Esposito

customer_reviews.title: Durable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The set up for the teepee was clear and easy to assemble. I didn’t love the flags they came with, the colors weren’t great and one of the flags already had a tear in them, but overall the durability of the teepee itself is great. Such a great addition to any bedroom or playroom.
customer_reviews.author: Robert LeCheminant

customer_reviews.title: Quality play tent for toddlers ( 2-4 years old)
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 for the Toddler Twins who are 2-1/2 years old. The loved them and take naps in them. It has no floor so we used a opened sleeping bag and their blankies. The tents have a small footprint due to the 4 posts supports with a space of 4.5' by 9'. I recommend this tent for kids.
customer_reviews.author: David Lee

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble with bad instructions
customer_reviews.text: The tent looks nice but the directions how to assemble it are horrible. The velcro pieces wich you use to close the tent "door" are not alined so that makes it hard to close and when you close it it lookes crooked. (See photo) There are parts that come in the package which are nor mentioned at all on the instructions paper, so I had to look it up on YouTube and try to figure out what those peaces are and how to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Mia H

customer_reviews.title: Stop Looking - This is the best tent.
customer_reviews.text: This tent is perfect. We have been through three tents that cost wayyy more and they weren't made as well as this one. It is canvas and the poles are strong. You can undo the tent and carry it in a canopy bag that comes with the tent. When you're done, you can also just fold it up and take it wherever you like. I never review products on Amazon. But this tent was so amazing, I had to give a shout out. They even give you the colored flags in the photo to help decorate the tent & it is super easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer   June

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup, BUT the sticks come apart and make it awkward when it comes apart while 'put together' I wish that they would stick together stronger and not fall apart so easily. Great product otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: mandie bunger

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute Tent! I need the help of another person to set it up, but it’s sturdy for a 4 yr old. Love that it comes with lights because she had asked for some. The material of the tent looks durable specially with two little ones. Will post pictures later.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: We bought some fairy lights to string inside and she could not be a happier camper.
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely precious! My 4 year old daughter is obsessed. She slept in it the first night and she and her dolls play in it frequently. It folds away quickly and pops back up without any issues. We bought some fairy lights to string inside and she could not be a happier camper.
customer_reviews.author: Rus

customer_reviews.title: Great photography prop!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for teepee just like this for my photography studio & I finally found it! It’s absolutely perfect! All the kids love to play in it & it makes for wonderful photos! My 3 kids were sad I was taking it to my studio & have already begged me to get a 2nd one for them!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Bettag

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I don’t get why people waste the money on the pricey PBKids ones... The only issue we have is that we put it on a wood floor and the legs tend to slide a little bit. We’ll be adding a carpet under it for more cushion and stability
customer_reviews.author: MobileReader

customer_reviews.title: Love our teepee!
customer_reviews.text: Love our teepee! It was easy and quick to assemble and collapses easily for storage as well. It’s taller and more roomy than I expected which is great because all three of my kids can fit in it together while they are playing. I added the flowers on top to make it more girly for my daughter, but the canvass fabric and off white color is very gender neutral and would be great for a boy or girl. Great value and price!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great tipi for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Tipi! It is a little tricky to get sturdy but my husband figured it out. I love that it came with the banner, although I wish you could choose your colors. I went ahead and hot-glued gold felt over the pink flags. I didn’t realize the inside had pockets for books, such a great feature! It’s was the perfect inspiration for a woodland theme.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetone

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Because of the good reviews, I purchased this. We just got it in the mail today and I was so excited to set it up. Was not what I was expecting and the velcro to hold the opening to the side wasn't put on properly.
customer_reviews.author: S E K

customer_reviews.title: Great teepee
customer_reviews.text: This teepee was so easy to set up. I love that I can assemble it and put it away when not in use. We have a small home so we love products that saves space. I set it up for the boys and fold it to lean on the wall when not in use. My kids have been using it as a nook to read books and play with dinos!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: It is such a cute little teepee! Both of my littles were so eager to get in it while we were putting it together. It didnt take long to set up and was really easy, its now one of the kids favorite hang out spots.
customer_reviews.author: Heather and Ryne Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Love it!! Easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: We got this teepee tent for my sons first birthday cake smash and now it’s set up in his playroom. Not only is it adorable to look at, but it hides some toys we don’t want out in the open, really nicely. He also loves to go in there and hide. I think as he gets older he’ll enjoy reading in there. It has nice protective caps on the bottoms of each leg, to not scratch the floor. It was simple to put together! Took maybe 5 minutes. Also the way it breaks down, it’s easy to travel with it and put the pieces in a suitcase if that was ever needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Witter

customer_reviews.title: I hate this tent
customer_reviews.text: I hate this tent. The pile connectors are not tight enough on some wood poles so as you assemble they keep coming apart. Very frustrating! Once up, as long as it is not jostled it stays up but if it falls over or one leg is much bed it might get all tumble again. I recommend assembling sand leaving up always.
customer_reviews.author: michael l cowan

customer_reviews.title: Great value and super cute!
customer_reviews.text: This teepee is super cute and very to assemble. The directions weren't that useful and could have been written with more detail but we figured it out on our own. The teepee itself has plenty of room for our little one to utilize and even grow into. I love that twinkle lights were included along with a fabric banner and feather decorations. Overall, I am very pleased with this product and would recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but had to return it
customer_reviews.text: I loved this teepee when I purchased and once you get the hang of tying the top it looks beautiful! However, it isn’t that sturdy. My one year old brought it down more than twice and constantly kept escaping through the sides between the tied in floor blanket and the flaps. It was very whimsical and very flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Would only recommend for one child to play  in only.
customer_reviews.text: This was difficult to put together by myself, the poles won't stay together when moving it l had to glue them which defeats the portable part of it. Found that (2) children can't play in it at one time without making it fall over. I was very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute tent but setup isn't easy
customer_reviews.text: Cute tent made of good materials. Kind of a pain to set up since the directions included are not complete and you really need two people. I also have to keep adjusting the poles since they aren't really held into place well. I with there was trouble shooting instructions included. I imagine we will figure it out eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany M

customer_reviews.title: Okay...ish
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for a 3 year old. She loves it for tea parties. It was easy to assemble but the quality is less than I hoped for with how much it cost me. May last a while, may not. We’ll see.
customer_reviews.author: glacierdreamer

customer_reviews.title: Slightly difficult assembly, but WORTH IT nonetheless!
customer_reviews.text: This product is ADORABLE. It was worth having to rearrange my nursery to make it fit! I can’t wait for my daughter to get older & make it her little happy place. I love that it’s so clean & simple that it can be easily customized. My only complaint is that the instructions are in broken English & not very thorough. It took me a little longer than I expected to put it together because of this, but it’s not really a big deal because It was worth it! I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Winter

customer_reviews.title: It's way too big for what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I do regret buying this. It was much bigger than the pictures lead on in my opinion. It takes up way too much space. One of the poles wont stay together. So if i even use it for my kid, I'm going to have to figure out how to fix that because duct tape isnt going to do the trick with this one. The fabric is thick and beautiful and it is a very cute idea.
customer_reviews.author: Remedy do da

customer_reviews.title: Not Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: First, the shipping was delayed a few times, even though it was Amazon Prime, and took more than twice as long as expected to arrive. On to the teepee itself...I have two infants and purchased this largely due to the description claiming it to be sturdy. After assembling it (which was easy) I found it to be flimsy and could easily collapse on an infant inside if they were to knock into any of the supports. Not worth the money, and will either look for something better to replace this with or make a trip to the hardware store to correct the issue myself.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Best Teepee Tent!
customer_reviews.text: This teepee tent is so amazing! It arrived in a small box and a fabric bag that you can carry anywhere if you want to. I also love that it’s white and just add any accessories according to your liking. The instructions assembly was a bit confusing at first and i would recommend to add more pictures instead, but took me around 10 minutes to figure everything out. So glad we got this and the fabric is really soft.
customer_reviews.author: Pia Anading

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is easy, but it’s not sturdy and collapses daily
customer_reviews.text: Cute in photos and read the reviews so we were hoping it would live up to expectations after having an adorable teepee tent from Crate & Barrel kids that was great, but old so we thought we’d replace it with one 1/3 the cost. I guess you get what you pay for... a cheap Chinese knockoff that collapses everyday. Assembly was easy, but it’s not sturdy (even with that wooden circle on top) and everything about it just feels cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Uchima-Carney

customer_reviews.title: So easy to assemble- a great affordable gift idea
customer_reviews.text: I was a little intimidated for this to arrive, thinking that it may be rough to put together but it was actually really easy and took me maybe 5 minutes. It’s super cute and I love how simple it is so that you can really personalize it to your space. Definitely a great by especially for how cheap it is. Put this on your gift idea list!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: I got this teepee for my kiddos and they absolutely love it. First of all, the packaging alone is great! Building it took less than 10 minutes & it comes with extra features for your kids to enjoy. What I love the most is that it is not heavy at all so I can move it from the kids room to the living room that way they can play with it. It also has the cutest little window on the side of the teepee and they love playing peekaboo. I would recommend this product 100%. Great quality, great price and fun!
customer_reviews.author: Naeli P

customer_reviews.title: but I wanted something cool to keep in his room
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's "Where the Wild Things Are" birthday party, but I wanted something cool to keep in his room. This is a great tent. It is very well made. The canvas is sturdy. I am extremely pleased. If you are looking for a gender neutral, quality indoor kids' room tent-- this is your best friend. I highly reocmmend.
customer_reviews.author: Melany C.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I recieved this product and planned to assemble it tonight( christmas eve) so it would be up for my toddler christmas morning. I opened the box and found that it came with one too many middle poles and not enough top poles. I am extremely disapointed by this. This is absolutely unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Ugh this Santa is disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So I love this and it’s adorable BUT I bought this months ago to hoard for Christmas. Here it is Christmas Eve and the poles don’t fit in the plastic pieces to hold it all together. Even with a rubber mallet, they aren’t budging. We rigged it so that it will work for Christmas morning but this mama is definitely disappointed in such a cute product. I really wish they fit like a glove like others I have seen. Really wish I could give this 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Stinnett

customer_reviews.title: Very Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: VERY flimsy. There aren’t pockets in the floor mat at the corners for the pipes to secure into so it just moves all over the place. I bought this one bc I was pressed for time and this was the only one available with prime. I regret not ordering sooner and getting something that was sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Wile

product_meta.title: little dove Kids Foldable Teepee Play Tent with Carry Case, Banner, Fairy Lights, Feathers, Floor Mat , Four Ploes Style Raw White Color - New Version
feature_bullets: Size&Color: This play tent is lightweight, the side length 43. 3inch, top height 59inch, pole length 70. 9inch. Perfect size for an apartment or bedroom.Color kinda taupe;beige. Natural canvas color, not off white.

High Quality for Your Child: This teepee tents are made of 100% natural, non-toxic, unpainted cotton canvas. The tent poles are made of sturdy pine wood and are free of chemical odors and harmful substances. The best choice for your adorable boys or girls.

The Uniqueness of Our Design: With curtains; front flaps could be closed completely, offering kids personal space for little secrets and encouraging them to become more independent and show respect for others. Two inner pockets lets kids store beloved dolls, books and snacks.

Bring your Child a Convenient and Joyful Life: Easy installation being a significant feature, this tent can be conveniently assembled by a single adult. Or you can have fun and install it with your kids. Comes with carry case, made to be portable and practical, so that you can carry your child’s favorite teepee anywhere with you.

Package Contains Everything: Kids Teepee Tent , Wooden Poles, Joints, Carry Bag, Floor Mat ( not padded ) ,String Light (Batteries doesn't Contain), Feathers. Busy (g)parents don't have to spend time searching for specialty lights, a canvas mat, etc.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,282 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
